entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JSON deserialization fails for documents with schema #79059
    Future
  • [Question] JIT codegen difference between 6.0 and 7.0 for BitOperations.Log2_uint #79058
  • XmlBinaryReader.ReadElementContentAsDouble() double.NaN deserialization issue .net7 #79056
  • Wire the bootstrap build for illink #79054
    8.0.0
  • System.Runtime work planned for .NET 8 #79053
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_CurrentUserOnly_Windows.Connection_UnderDifferentUsers_BehavesAsExpected test failure #79052
  • [wasm] `dotnet-runtime-perf` - OOM on `Perf_File.ReadAllBytes` with `size=100M` #79047
    8.0.0
  • Private enumeration type can not be recognized when converted to dynamic #79045
  • [mono] Failing test ApplyUpdateTests.AsyncMethodChanges #79043
    8.0.0
  • Does MAUI not trust Android user-added root CAs? #79041
    8.0.0
  • ILCompiler --make-repro-path improvements #79032
    8.0.0
  • On Windows File.CreateSymbolicLink method does not create a working symlink in case the pathToTarget parameter is a relative path with forward slashes #79031
  • System.IO.Ports.SerialPort has no IntelliSense documentation #79030
  • [mono][interp] Speed up invoke path #79029
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Allow source generated logging methods to receive a scope parameter #79028
    Future
  • Http Client every first time response slow if publish single file with self-contained #79023
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Remainder example fails for LLVMFullAot #79022
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal] Expose `System.String` static methods as string extensions #79020
    Future
  • CodeGen infrastructure work planned for .NET 8 #79018
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: add libraries test run collection #79017
    8.0.0
  • Change trimming workaround for Linq.Expressions usage of custom operators #79016
  • superpmi: add real world benchmarks collection #79015
    8.0.0
  • Add tests for MSBuild tasks in `src/tasks` #79010
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [wasm] Compilation with WasmBuildNative fails with dependency containing hyphen in the name #78992
    8.0.0
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.101] System.Reflection.AmbiguousMatchException: 'Ambiguous match found.' #78938
    7.0.2
  • Builds fails with `exited with code 1` with no apparent error #76906
  • `dotnet build` returns exit code `1` even when the build passes #74328
    8.0.0
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Multiple `JIT.*` runtime test failures on rolling builds #75391
    8.0.0
  • How to identify HttpClient connect timeout errors? #78070
  • Crash in HttpListener during application teardown due to bad safehandle handling #78326
  • CI Linux failure: SyncHttpHandler_HttpProtocolTests_Dribble.GetAsync_ResponseHasNormalLineEndings_Success #76678
  • ssl certificate processing logic error #78957
  • Socket support for TCP_QUICKACK #798
    Future
  • DualModeAcceptAsync.AcceptAsyncV*BountTo* tests failed with TimeoutException #22620
    Future
  • Tests failed: System.Net.Sockets.Tests.DnsEndPointTest / * #21924
    Future
  • Add variations of SocketTestServer to increase test coverage in System.Net.Sockets.Tests #19952
    Future
  • DualModeAcceptAsync.AcceptAsyncV6BoundToAnyV4_CantConnect failed in CI #19162
    Future
  • Native crash in `System.Xml.XmlSchema.XmlSchemaValidatorApi.Tests` #64719
    Future
  • Generate Unsafe Span code for most of the looping #78981
  • Encoding between Internal.Console.Write and SystemNative_Log not aligned for iOS #78971
  • System.Text.Json source generator fails if [Required(ErrorMessage = "...")] attribute is present. #62937
    6.0.x
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 9 Regressions on 11/18/2022 7:31:41 AM #78827
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 11/19/2022 1:29:52 AM #78822
  • [Perf] Linux/arm64: 5 Regressions on 11/19/2022 1:29:52 AM #78837
  • Will JsonSerializer support parsing to existing object? #29538
    Future
  • Setting the TCP keep alive for an HttpClient should be significantly simpler #77755
  • System.Net.Http.Unit.Tests failing under jitstress #78912
    8.0.0
  • [Android] SSLStream throws 'Handshake has already been started' on API level 26 #78716
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: IndexOfAnyValues<T>.Contains(T) #78722
    8.0.0
  • superpmi: add coreclr test run collection #47543
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe sessions can leak the EventPipeThreadSessionState* associated with them #76430
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR failed to run tests on with MSVC on windows according to runtime/docs/workflow documentation #36869
    Future
  • [SuperPMI] Store the MCH file in azure storage using the JIT-EE GUID #11842
    Future
  • [SuperPMI] When running superpmi emit the amount of bytes for methods with no-diff #13322
    Future
  • Allow loading COM components in default ALC #79012
  • [release/7.0][wasm] Interpreter assertion failure for `System.Xml.RW.XmlWriterApi.Tests` with *AOT* #78358
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase size of Number's small numbers cache, and make it lazy #79061
  • Remove getFieldAddress #79060
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #79057
    Servicing-consider, area-Host, 7.0.x
  • Avoid caching compilation data and use value equality for SyntaxNodes #79051
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Split #79048
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • [draft][wasi] compile with libs.native #79046
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [hot_reload] Enable some CustomAttributes tests on Mono; new issue for async #79044
    area-EnC-mono
  • Small ConfigurationBinder Cleanup #79042
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/7.0] [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #79040
    area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #79039
    area-System.Net.Security
  • initial support for '@' symbol in message template #79038
  • Improve "one asg morphing" and move it to `morphblock.cpp` #79037
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Update a few dependencies #79036
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable loading COM component in default ALC via runtime config setting #79026
    area-Host
  • Experiment with changing the implementation strategy for RangeListMap #79021
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add faster DAC EnumMemoryRegion option with less memory usage #79014
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Handle zero value modulus for OpenSSL 1.1 #79013
    area-System.Security
  • Remaining feedback part1 #79011
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • [Release/7.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79009
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [Release/6.0] Don't emit manifest for NativeRuntimeEventSource (#78213) #79008
    area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.14

Merged

  • [wasm] Correctly escape library names when generating symbols for .c #79007
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in Uri.EscapeString helper #79024
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] Fix configuration binding with types implementing IDictionary<,> #79019
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 7.0.2
  • Delete DOTNET_CLI_DO_NOT_USE_MSBUILD_SERVER workarounds #79035
    area-Infrastructure
  • Move AT_EXECFN to fallback for /proc/self/exe #78958
    area-Host, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [wasm][mt] making JSImport work on worker thread #78847
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add readmes for System.Runtime, System.Runtime.Numerics, System.Buffers, System.Runtime.Intrinsics #77332
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Enable basic Kept validation in NativeAOT running linker tests #78828
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Consolidate approach for conditional tests that check for privileged processes #78793
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [Release/6.0][PERF] Fix perf repo branch setup target, tool build, and mono-dotnet create #78411
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-mono, 6.0.13
  • Use IndexOfAnyValues in ArchivingUtils #79025
    area-System.IO.Compression, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Fix Vector128 divide by scalar #78784
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Fix issue with last_gc_before_oom flag being reset by intervening gen 1 GC. #78973
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [Android] Remove repeated calls to beginHandshake #78849
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • [Android] Prevent exceptions with a 'Success' message in System.Net.NetworkInformation #78555
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Disable APICompat assembly validation in source build #79027
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Transform `STRUCT`-typed uses of primitives in local morph #78131
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Internal.Console.Write uses unicode encoding for iOS #78974
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add .NET 7 source gen regression tests #78857
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Update to the stable 7.0.100 SDK #78034
    area-Infrastructure, 8.0.0
  • Add simple Else conditions to If Conversion #77728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix initblk/cpblk and STORE_DYN_BLK size mismatch #78930
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] ActiveIssue: JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes - System.ObjectDisposedException #78976
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Don't gitignore linker #79002
  • Place non-GC statics in the dehydratable section #78795
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Place frozen objects into dehydrated section #78688
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Place dispatch cells in dehydrated section #78748
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add IndexOfAnyValues.Contains #78996
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix compiling EXE modules as native libraries #78949
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix configuration binding with types implementing IDictionary<,> #78946
    area-Extensions-Configuration

Updated

  • Remove FILEDosToUnixPathA conversion #78995
    breaking-change, area-PAL-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Implement a heuristic for using fast-path serialization in streaming JsonSerializer methods. #78646
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Remove instances of `%S` #78894
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Implement unmanaged-to-managed direction for vtable stub generator #77130
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • Fold some HW nodes for constant input #78929
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasi][draft] build WASI #77823
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Support GT_SELECT on xarch #78879
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2057077 #78677
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Disallow `IND<struct>` except as a source of `STORE_DYN_BLK` #74784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Refactoring tests to support both external and loopback servers #74579
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Wasm jiterpreter cleanup and bug fixes pt. 3 #78782
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [draft][wasm] Memory snapshot #78915
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove mono specific SpanHelpers #78015
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adding the Vector512 and Vector512<T> types #76642
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • [Android] Fix SslStream on Android API 21-23 #78918
    area-System.Net.Security, os-android
  • Exclude things which broken on Loongarch #78850
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Fix repro package creation #78924
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Throw invalid program if stack state is invalid #73215
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Allow inlining in some over-bugdet cases #78874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double IndexOf throughput for chars #78861
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [JIT] - Fixed sub-optimal optimization for `a % 1` to Zero #77760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not overallocate SocketAddress.Buffer #78860
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - `CAST` removals for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [JIT] - Fix blocking CI IL test #78999
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unify BufferedFileStreamStrategy seeking #78984
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
